Key Strengths: Initial term of 36 months aligns with best practices.
Clear payment terms with a defined late fee structure.
Service Level Agreements (SLAs) are well-defined with credit mechanisms.
Critical Weaknesses: Termination provisions lack clarity on manual negotiation for renewal.
Indemnification and liability caps are not adequately defined.
Data protection measures are not explicitly outlined.
Priority Recommendations: Clarify termination and renewal provisions to ensure mutual understanding.
Define indemnification and liability caps to limit exposure.
Include explicit data protection measures to enhance security.
